name: After Market
cardText: Players may trash any of their Ship Parts for 2 Credits each.

name: Border Raids
cardText: All players may roll a die: +1 Bonus Card, No result, Trash a Ship Part

name: Bravado Mandate
cardText: All contracts add +1 Hazard Die and +1 Prestige to the negotiation pool.

name: Champion Sponsor
cardText: Gain 2 Credits each time you lose a Prestige.

name: Communal Rings
cardText: All players draw +2 cards at the start of a contract. All Thruster cards draw 1 less card.

name: Council Decree
cardText: Draw Objectives equal to the number of players. Draft from lowest to highest Prestige.

name: Council Election
cardText: All players may roll a die: Gain an Objective, No result, Lose an Objective.

name: Debris Recovery
cardText: Draw Ship Parts equal to the number of players. Draft from lowest to highest Prestige.

name: Defense Force
cardText: When you stay at base: Draw 3 Objectives and keep 2, but gain 0 Credits.

name: Dextral Gala
cardText: All players simultaneously give a card from their hand to the player on their right. Add the new card to your hand.

name: Flak Mandate
cardText: You may trash 1 Shield from your hand to roll 1 less Hazard Die.

name: Grand Rally
cardText: All players travel to Ventus. They may draw a card.

name: Lidar Control
cardText: All Hazard Dice are automatically set to 1 Hazard.

name: Market Influx
cardText: Ship Parts cost 1 Credit less. Crew cost 1 Credit more.

name: Merchant's Panel
cardText: All players travel to Komek and may search their draw pile for a Reactor and add it to their hand. Those players shuffle their draw pile.

name: Nebulae Storm
cardText: All players may roll a die, then must trash 1 card from: Draw or Discard Piles, Hand, Top of Draw Pile.

name: Nitro Boost
cardText: All players may discard 1 Thruster from their hand to draw +2 Cards.

name: Overcharge
cardText: All players travel to Komek. They may discard a Reactor to gain 1 Credit.

name: Overclock
cardText: All players travel to Ventus. They may discard 1 Thruster to gain 1 Credit.

name: Overstock
cardText: All players may buy any 1 action card for 2 Credits.

name: Passing Traders
cardText: Players may trash the top card from their draw pile to add any action card to their discard pile.

name: Plasma Reserves
cardText: +1 hand limit for everyone. All contracts have -1 Credit reward.

name: Prison Break
cardText: Draw Crew equal to the number of players. Draft, from lowest to highest Prestige, to their discard piles.

name: Prophet's Comet
cardText: All players guess a card type and draw the top card from their deck. If guessed correctly, gain 2 Credits. If not, trash the card.

name: Ritual Lavation
cardText: All players travel to Magnomi. They may trash a card from their hands.

name: Salvage Bot
cardText: Any player may trash an Objective card to gain any action card to their discard pile.

name: Scorched Earth
cardText: All Damage requirements are increased by 1. All contracts with Damage requirements have +1 Credit reward.

name: Scrap Auction
cardText: Draw 1 of each default loadout card. Players draft from lowest to highest Prestige, to their discard piles. Remaining cards are trashed.

name: Shifted Devotion
cardText: Players may trash an Objective card to gain 3 Credits.

name: Side Hustle
cardText: Pay 1 Credit to draw 1 Objective card.

name: Sinistral Gala
cardText: All players simultaneously give a card from their hand to the player on their left. Add the new card to your hand.

name: Special Training
cardText: Ship Parts cost 1 Credit more. Crew cost 1 Credit less.

name: System Cycle
cardText: All players may discard 3 cards from their hand to draw +2 Cards.

name: Time Dilation
cardText: Players may freely travel to any sector.

name: Touring Merchant
cardText: All players may roll a die: Gain 2 Credits, No result, Lose 1 Credits.
